definition: to take care (of)/to control/to manage/to be in charge of/to look after/to run/to care about/tube/pipe/woodwind/classifier for tube-shaped objects/particle similar to 把[ba3] in 管...叫 constructions/writing brush/(coll.) to/towards

sentences.english: By 1958, new models of transistor radios from Sony sold widely throughout the world.
sentences.chinese: 到1958年，索尼新型晶體管收音機銷遍全世界。

sentences.english: Dual P-channel enhancement mode MOS transistor.
Your transistor radio can accompany you wherever you go.
sentences.chinese: 晶體管收音機伴你走四方。

sentences.english: Optocoupler, Phototransistor Output, With Base Connection.
sentences.chinese: 光耦，光電晶體管輸出，基地連接。

sentences.english: The region in a transistor between the emitter and the collector.
sentences.chinese: 晶體管中發射極和集電極之間的區域。

sentences.english: Wiring or soldering those would take several lifetimes.
sentences.chinese: 焊接和連接這些晶體管需要好幾輩子。

sentences.english: Until 1964 there was the first all-transistor signal generator.
sentences.chinese: 直到1964年纔出現第一臺全晶體管的。

sentences.english: Problems arose between oscillator coils and the transistors themselves.
sentences.chinese: 問題出在振盪線圈和晶體管之間。

sentences.english: Electrical Materials lightings, motor pumps, transistors.
sentences.chinese: 電子材料照明，電動泵，晶體管。

sentences.english: A bipolar junction transistor relates to the technical field of a semiconductor power device.
sentences.chinese: 雙極結型晶體管，涉及半導體功率器件技術領域。

sentences.english: It, too, plans to build flat transistors with undoped channels.
sentences.chinese: 它同樣計劃構造一個無摻雜隧道的平面晶體管。

sentences.english: Only one external transistor is required for varactor-line driving.
sentences.chinese: 只有一個外部晶體管所需的變容二極管，線路驅動。

sentences.english: There were computers before the transistor; they used vacuum tubes as logic elements.
sentences.chinese: 在晶體管發明前，計算機採用真空管作爲邏輯原件。

sentences.english: The a-Si thin film transistor ( TFT) used as room temperature infrared detector is studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了用於室溫紅外探測的非晶硅薄膜晶體管。
在此提出一種金屬基極晶體管。
